description: This file sets up an agent with a specific model and tools, uploads an image file to Google Generative AI, and prompts the agent to analyze the image and provide news related to it.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with models and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A Google model used within the agent.

methods.name: upload_file
methods.description: Uploads a file to Google Generative AI.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a prompt.

search-terms: image analysis with Google Generative AI
